word_mean: 感染，传染：微生物侵犯人体组织并在其中繁殖。感染在临床上可以是无症状的，或者由于竞争性代谢、毒素、细胞内增殖或抗原抗体反应造成局部细胞损害。机体的免疫应答可以是一时性的或长期的，包括对入侵病原或其毒素的细胞反应(迟发型超敏反应)或产生特异性(免疫球蛋白)抗体
病原体侵入生物机体并生长繁殖，引起机体病理反应的过程。
疠气相互传播而造成新的感染的发病途径。

sentence.Network_en: A cold is an infection of the upper respiratory tract.
sentence.Network_cn: 感冒是上呼吸道的感染。

sentence.Network_en: They've picked up a really nasty infection from something they've eaten.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们因吃错东西而得了很严重的感染症。

sentence.Network_en: All blood products are now heat treated to kill off any infection.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前所有血液制品均经过热处理，以防止各种感染。

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... effectuate v 使…有效 infect v 传染；感化 infection n 传染；感化.
职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... infancy 婴儿期，幼年期，初期 infect 传染，感染，使受影响 infection 传染(病)，影响.
2. 感染力(infectivity)： 是病原体从一个蚕体引入传染到另一个蚕体的能力。它包括侵入、稳定、破坏其防御系统、取食并在其中发育 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin infectio(n-), from Latin inficere 'dip in, taint' (see infect)

entry.def: An infection is a disease caused by germs or bacteria.

example.ex: Ear infections are common in pre-school children...
example.tran: 耳部感染在学前儿童中很常见。

example.ex: Exactly which bacteria cause the infection is still unknown.
example.tran: 到底是什么细菌引起的感染还不清楚。

means.word_mean: 1. the pathological state resulting from the invasion of the body by pathogenic microorganisms
2. (phonetics) the alteration of a speech sound under the influence of a neighboring sound
3. (medicine) the invasion of the body by pathogenic microorganisms and their multiplication which can lead to tissue damage and disease
4. an incident in which an infectious disease is transmitted
5. the communication of an attitude or emotional state among a number of people;

sentences.sentence: "the infection of his enthusiasm for poetry"
"ambitious men are led astray by an infection that is almost unavoidable"

means.word_mean: 7. (international law) illegality that taints or contaminates a ship or cargo rendering it liable to seizure

auth_sentence.content: The infection may last for up to three months.
auth_sentence.res_content: The infection may last for up to three months.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The infection may last for up to three months.

auth_sentence.content: That's a brain infection caused by a fungus.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's a brain infection caused by a fungus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's a brain infection caused by a fungus.

auth_sentence.content: What we also see is a huge co-infection rate.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: What we also see is a huge co-infection rate.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受到影响的,不自然的,假装的
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ed……的→被影响的
affection[n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适]+ate……的→adj.挚爱的,充满感情的
affect情感+ive……的→adj.情感的,表达感情的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象
stems_affixes.word_buile: effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+ive……的→adj.有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象

stems_affixes.value_cn: 传染的,传染性的,有感染力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: infect传染+ious……的→adj.传染的,传染性的,有感染力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的
disaffect[v.使不满意,使疏远]+ed……的→adj.[政治上]不满的,叛离的
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响

stems_affixes.value_cn: 爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ion表名词→n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
confect[v.调制,n.西点,糖果]+ion某种物→n.甜食,糖果

stems_affixes.value_cn: 糖果制造人, 糖果店
stems_affixes.word_buile: confection[n.甜食,糖果]+ery场所→n.糖果制造人, 糖果店
de坏+fect做,制作→做坏了→缺陷
de坏+fect做+ion表名词→做坏事
affect感动+ation表名词→做出的感动→做作
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
infect[v.传染,感染;影响[思想等]]+ion状态→n.感染,传染;传染病
perfect[adj.完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的 v.使完美]+ion表名词→n.尽善尽美,完美
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
dis分开+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+u+ate表动词→v.实行,完成
in进入+fect做,制作→做进去→传染进去
per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的

Sentence.sentence: Both strains quickly invaded local hospitals when needle sharing and other unhealthy practices ensured the rapid spreading of the infection by bringing people into contact with contaminated body fluids.
